title: How old are each Champion?
body:
One thing that I was wondering about was the age of each champion. I know that the lore is rather obscure so just as an example for fun I would add my guess on how old each champ is. feel free to add yours too.

BTW: This is gonna be a looooooooooooooooooooooooooooong list.

{{champion:266}} : Ageless

{{champion:103}}  8-16 (physically 18)years (being a magically alter fox she would have been an adult fox a 10 months old)  

{{champion:84}} : 21 years

{{champion:12}} 35 years

{{champion:32}} 1500+ years (physically 10)

{{champion:34}} Ageless

{{champion:1}}  8 Years

{{champion:22}} 25 years

{{champion:136}} Since the creation of the universe, around 4.5 Billion years old+

{{champion:268}} 35 years(existed as spirit for 1000 years)

{{champion:432}} Ageless

{{champion:53}} 13 Years

{{champion:63}} Brand: Ageless Kigan: 31-32 years.

{{champion:201}} 4000? years if Iceborn or ageless if he is a spirit.

Updated the list for the new champions and reworked ones.

Small note on Katarina. I think that she and the Du Couteau bloodline possess great longevity as they are the descent from mages turned assassins, living up to twice that of a normal person so one of the reasons I listed her age as 36 was because of Cassiopeia's Maturity and personality would imply she is youngish and that because she is the youngest of her sisters and it's implied the she was one or three more sisters besides Kat, which would make the age gap more reasonable. And on the subject of Du Couteau Longevity, I would be that Marcus is 72 years old.

Edit: BIG mistake on my part, there really are only two Du Couteau sisters. Which would really make Kat 31 at most.

replies.body: It was confirmed that Jinx is actually the same age or slightly older than Vi.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-19T23:36:46.569+0000)
>
> It was confirmed that Jinx is actually the same age or slightly older than Vi.

Where is does it say that? I would really to like to the site where it's confirmed to help out with the list, thanks.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1no2gi/we_are_the_jinx_team_ama/cckcym5

By all that is malicious and unholy, that took a while to find.
What's the highlander theory? Capt?

> [{quoted}](name=Tails Doll,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-09-20T00:53:05.301+0000)
>
> What's the highlander theory? Capt?

I suppose that is a reference to his old lore. In his old lore, Master Yi was the oldest human in Runeterra... so, the theory would be that his old lore still canon.

> [{quoted}](name=Tails Doll,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-09-20T00:53:05.301+0000)
>
> What's the highlander theory? Capt?

I read on Yi's page on Lol Wiki that Yi might be older that he appears because the name of his ult is the same as film Highlander and when he kills during his ult, ki emanates off him similar to the quickening, also His joke: "The key to immortality? Not dying."  Would imply that Wuju grants him slowed down aging.

Syndra 17, dafuq? More like 9...

She looks like 23-25 at least.
I think is 17-21 since her actitude about ("YOU ARE NOT MY MOM" *kills mom*)
She was around that age in her bio, but it's confirmed a few years passed since then.
Wow Vlad is younger than I thought. Great list.
Its not 100% true, its just what he thinks
Technically, {{champion:266}} has an age since he is a member of an ancient race... but he is very old. And all the voidborns should be "Timeless" since they dont have "time" in the void.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-19T22:39:50.944+0000)
>
> Technically, {{champion:266}} has an age since he is a member of an ancient race... but he is very old. And all the voidborns should be "Timeless" since they dont have "time" in the void.

fair enough I'll remember that.

{{champion:143}}  looks 24 or something
{{champion:119}}  is definitly in his 30s
{{champion:41}}  52~
{{champion:131}}  29

Why is everyone so old?? For example, I'd think :

{{champion:55}} is 24
{{champion:22}} is 20
{{champion:92}} is 26
Ekko is 17?!

> [{quoted}](name=Witch Of Babylon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-09-20T02:12:48.425+0000)
>
> Ekko is 17?!

yup.
Id put it closer to like 14-15 since they said vi/jinx are older than him by a bit
Remember he doesn't stop aging with his time manipulation. He can be 17 but look 14-15.

the other way round, be 15 and look 17.
He is repeating that time so he is aging faster than normal.
{{champion:103}} 8-16 (18 Physically) Ahri is most probably well over 20 mentally and physically. Heimer and Ziggs would be similar in ages since they work together and are good friends.

> [{quoted}](name=King Odarth,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-09-20T04:25:18.426+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} 8-16 (18 Physically) Ahri is most probably well over 20 mentally and physically. Heimer and Ziggs would be similar in ages since they work together and are good friends.

Heimerdinger is the teacher of Ziggs and other yordles in the Piltover Academy... Ziggs should have the same age of Rumble or maybe even younger considering that Rumble was invited to that academy before Ziggs.

No ziggs is definitely younger, not as young as teemo or rumble, but somewhere in the middle, friendship has nothing to do with age, especially between colleagues. Corki however is an old freind of Heimer, so they should be rather close, considering his appearance he may even be a bit older.

I#d place Ziggs somewhere around 35 and Corki at 55.

there are  afew of those that i don't entirely agree with

Garen is the long standing pride of the demacian military so i always pictured him in his late 30's early 40's
J4 is the crown prince and his father is getting old, so i'd put him between 30-40 y-o as well since him and garen were childhood friends
Xin zhao was an adult when J4's Grandfather led a rescue team into Noxus to free him so i'd put him more in the mid 50's

but aside from that the list seems pretty solid, maybe i'd put irelia a few years older considering she's a war veteran and kind of a lich too at this point

> [{quoted}](name=Captain Aishi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-09-20T13:52:34.332+0000)
>
> there are  afew of those that i don't entirely agree with
> 
> Garen is the long standing pride of the demacian military so i always pictured him in his late 30's early 40's
> J4 is the crown prince and his father is getting old, so i'd put him between 30-40 y-o as well since him and garen were childhood friends
> Xin zhao was an adult when J4's Grandfather led a rescue team into Noxus to free him so i'd put him more in the mid 50's
> 
> but aside from that the list seems pretty solid, maybe i'd put irelia a few years older considering she's a war veteran and kind of a lich too at this point

Well it's hard to say. I'd say Garen is youngish because he has a younger sister and and judging by the look of his face. He is not in his 40's as he looks manly as hell but doesn't have the "aged" factor with it like Darius.

Galio only 29 years?
Sions quotes imply that the 2 have fought against each other when Sion was still alive,meaning that Galio was already a thing during the time of Jarvan 1,so he should be old enough to be JarvanIVs Grandfather(maybe even older)

I also think it is unlikely for Blitzcrank to be 17 years old.
I mean Viktor fell into his depression because piddly managed to take the credit for blitzcrank,meaning that if bc is 17,then viktor would be already a cyborg for several years(at least 15 or something like that).
They grow up so fast

Actually is wrong, since she was a 9 tailed fox, in japanese folklore the magical fox got a tail every thousand years.

So tecnically ahri should be arround 9.000 years old.

But Ahris lore is also different from the myth of the nine-tailed fox,so there is no reason why the rules of the myths should apply to her(not to mention that she is based on the korean version of the myth,which is a bit different).
Wtf, Katarina, at 36, older than most of the other humans including people like Darius and Karma...
I am guessing she is mid 20s, if she is that age than damn Garen is into milfs.

> [{quoted}](name=Shonjl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=00060002,timestamp=2015-10-14T23:41:58.084+0000)
>
> I am guessing she is mid 20s, if she is that age than damn Garen is into milfs.

If Cassie was the older sister I would have at Katarina was around 26-29 years old.

This list was fun to read :) I personally feel like Irelia and Syndra are older than 17 (though Syndra prob is pretty young, maybe 20?). Nice summary though! (Props for remembering Brand's pirate vessel name was 'Kigan'; even i had forgotten that)
Irelia 17?? Shes like 28 or something and Darius is in his 40-50's, Draven in his mid 30's, Zed and Shen probably 30-34

This looks... pretty much random in some parts, honestly :p even tought i recognize is done for fun.

This applies mostly to yordles, since we do not know how they age, Braum ( as far as i know he is pretty much a dude, after all, and not an iceborn or some weird stuff ), Elise ( she might even be centenary, since she renews her immortality sacrifice after sacrifice ), Corky ( to be a veteran as he states he should be a tad older?), Swain ( hell he looks like 60! ) and many others.
Cass is Kat's older sister
I would say Annie is probably 5. 8 seems far too old

> [{quoted}](name=HayRoss,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-20T02:51:19.740+0000)
>
> I would say Annie is probably 5. 8 seems far too old

And I'd say that 5 is a little too young.  But it is conformed in lore that annie is 8 when she joined the league pre-recon. So she more or less is still the same age until riot updates her lore.
But her voice +character look makes her look far younger. If they've confirmed it, then that's fine; but she just looks to young

> [{quoted}](name=HayRoss,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2015-09-20T03:50:05.044+0000)
>
> But her voice +character look makes her look far younger. If they've confirmed it, then that's fine; but she just looks to young

"10) He does not keep himself young, his time powers are not able to reach across years like Zilean. Ekko is straight up younger than Vi and Jinx " -Ekko Q&A.
My sister is 26 and she still gets carded to see rated R movies, which you have to be 17+ to see, sometimes you don't always look your age >.>.
Riot did note that Jinx and Vi are much older than Ekko (who is 16/17ish). So Jinx being 18 doesn't sound too accurate.
add about 7-10 years to most human champions
{{champion:17}}  25 years old. that seems so strange lol.
With Orianna, are you saying since her creation or since her human form was born? Because her human form is definitely older than 3.

How can Jarvan and Garen be the same age... they are not twins. just brothers.

And I also imagined Cait being more in her early 30s

> [{quoted}](name=Galacticamaru,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=toIVtdJA,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2016-10-18T23:28:36.585+0000)
>
> How can Jarvan and Garen be the same age... they are not twins. just brothers.
> 
> And I also imagined Cait being more in her early 30s

That would make them, twin brother anyway. LOOOOOOOOOOOOL

But in all fairness. I didn't intend to say they were the same age for the fun of it. it just seem reasonable to guess that was their age.

Pantheon is off.  Atreus was only about 19ish give or take when he got possessed.  Leona would be either the same age, and just handed the reins of leading the Ra-Horak at a hilariously young age, or she was a good number of years older and just couldn't beat up a child.

First lets assume everyone at present at the moment the blessed isles turned into the shadow isles is the correct age.  Mordekaiser cant be older than them else he'd have most likely taken over Valoran (idk if that is the name of the continent or Ruintera is one should be the continent and one the name of the world) i say that because i dont think that Mordekaiser was an incompetent  conqueror  and the blessed isles would have been conquered long before it turned into the shadow isles.  I think all of this far predated the time or Azir Shrimia or Amumu. All of this before the time The Noxus became a city state.
Karthus would be a recently created wraith no older than 200 years if not modern story time.
and remember Mordekaiser was revived in the shadow isles. and his been bideing his time
I belive irelia is 23 or 28
